name: First Landings Aviation
about: First Landings Aviation, established in 2009, is a premier flight school located near Orlando in Central Florida at the Apopka Airport. We specialize in providing professional and personalized flight training, focusing on safety, excellence, and fun. Our team of highly experienced and certified flight instructors offer tailored training programs for both recreational and professional pilots. With a modern fleet of aircraft, including Piper PA-28-181 Archers, Tecnam P2006t multi-engine planes, and Cessna 172s, we ensure students receive comprehensive and efficient training. Our location at an uncontrolled airfield minimizes taxi and flight times to practice areas, maximizing flight experience. We also offer financing options and specialized programs for international students. At First Landings Aviation, we are committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals with personalized instruction and a dedication to your success.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
